results.description: Liverpool under-23 captain and Scotland U21 defender George Johnston has completed a move to Feyenoord.
results.title: Liverpool: Scotland U21 defender George Johnston signs for Feyenoord

results.description: Bayern Munich go top of the Bundesliga for the first time since September by thrashing Wolfsburg 6-0.
results.shortTitle: Bayern top for first time since September
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-0 Wolfsburg: Champions top for first time since September

results.description: Former Aston Villa and Germany midfielder Thomas Hitzlsperger is named as the sporting director at Bundesliga strugglers Stuttgart.
results.title: Thomas Hitzlsperger named Stuttgart sporting director

results.description: Blackburn-born forward Anastasios Donis scores but cannot prevent Stuttgart suffering a heavy Bundesliga defeat at champions Bayern Munich.
results.title: Bayern Munich 4-1 VfB Stuttgart

results.description: Bayern Munich will sign defender Benjamin Pavard from fellow German club Stuttgart in July.
results.shortTitle: Bayern to sign Pavard from Stuttgart
results.title: Bayern Munich to sign Benjamin Pavard from Stuttgart

results.description: Stuttgart mourn the loss of captain Christian Gentner's father, who died in the stadium after Saturday's win over Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: Stuttgart captain's dad dies in stadium
results.title: Stuttgart: Christian Gentner's father dies in stadium after Bundesliga game

results.description: Jadon Sancho and Paco Alcacer continue their remarkable form with goals as leaders Borussia Dortmund thrash Stuttgart.
results.shortTitle: Sancho scores as Dortmund beat Stuttgart
results.title: Stuttgart 1-4 Borussia Dortmund: Jadon Sancho and Paco Alcacer score in win

results.description: The weekend saw three bizarre own goals - which one was the worst?
results.shortTitle: Three terrible own goals - which one was worst?
results.title: Own goals: Man City Women, Stuttgart & Olympiakos's mistakes

results.description: Stuttgart goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler concedes an embarrassing own goal during their 2-1 win over Werder Bremen, misjudging a throw-in from defender Borna Sosa.
results.shortTitle: Stuttgart's comedy own goal from throw-in
results.title: Bundesliga: Stuttgart concede comedy own goal from throw-in

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores his sixth goal in four games as Bayern Munich continue their winning start under Niko Kovac.
results.shortTitle: Lewandowski scores again as Bayern win
results.title: Stuttgart 0-3 Bayern Munich: Robert Lewandowski scores again as champions win

results.description: Jupp Heynckes' Bundesliga managerial career ends with defeat as champions Bayern Munich suffer a first home league defeat in two years.
results.title: Bayern Munich 1-4 Stuttgart

results.description: Bundesliga strugglers Stuttgart sack boss Hannes Wolf after a seventh defeat in eight league and cup games.
results.title: Stuttgart sack boss Hannes Wolf after defeat to Schalke

thumbnail.altText: Hannes Wolf who has been sacked by Stuttgart

results.description: Germany striker Mario Gomez joins Stuttgart from Wolfsburg and hopes he can break into the World Cup squad.
results.title: Mario Gomez: Stuttgart sign Germany striker from Wolfsburg

results.description: Bayern Munich goalkeeper Sven Ulreich saves a 95th-minute penalty as the Bundesliga leaders beat Stuttgart.
results.title: VfB Stuttgart 0-1 Bayern Munich

results.description: Borussia Dortmund's problems continue as they lose to mid-table Stuttgart in the Bundesliga.
results.title: VfB Stuttgart 2-1 Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Borussia Dortmund ta dakatar da Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang a matakin da ta dauka na ladabtar da shi.
results.title: Dortmund ta dakatar da Aubameyang

results.description: England youth defender Danny Collinge talks to BBC Sport three years on from his move to one of Germany's most famous clubs.
results.title: Danny Collinge: VfB Stuttgart's Englishman 'never questions' move to Germany

results.description: Leicester sell goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler to Stuttgart for an undisclosed fee after a year with the Premier League club.
results.title: Ron-Robert Zieler: Leicester sell goalkeeper to Stuttgart

results.description: Mai rike da kofin Premier Chelsea ta dauki dan wasan Roma, Antonio Rudiger kan yarjejeniyar shekara biyar, amma ba ta fadi kudin da ta sayi dan kwallon ba.
results.title: Chelsea ta dauki Rudiger daga Roma
